name: The Land of Despair
description:
You are trapped in the woods in a land known as the "The Land of Despair", you will have you journey through these woods if you hope to escape. If by chance you escape these woods, there is one last challenge for you to truly escape The Land of Despair.  

\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\Instructions\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/

Controls:

W = Move forward

A = Turn left

S = Move backwards

D = Turn right

Z = Strafe left

X = Strafe right

Pressing no keys = Turn invisible so that the enemies will not see you. You can turn left and right while using this ability, but if you move in any direction the ability will end.   

  Enemy Info:

White Spotlight Enemies: If you are seen by these enemies, you will be sent to the beginning of the level

Red Spotlight Enemy: If you are seen by this enemy, you will die, and the game will be over.

   

Objective: 

Collect at least 5 coins to be able to go to the next level. Then, once you are ready to go to this final level you must find the Blue Pillars of Answers, and you will be teleported to the next level.  

Once you are at the final level you must collect at least 10 coins from the level, and then find the Blue Pillars of Answers to escape. 

Just don’t die along the way.

 @MagentaAutumn made the sound and some programming
